formatDescription: CINEMA 4D is a 3D modeling, animation and rendering application developed by MAXON Computer GmbH.  CINEMA 4D as a file format can contain elements of animation, modeling, texturing and rendering.
provenanceCompoundName: Georgia Tech Research Institute / Georgia Tech Research Institute
formatProvenance:
Specification Link: http://paulbourke.net/dataformats/cinema4d/cinema4d.pdf
As quoted by Wikipedia Cinema 4D Version 1.0 was released in 1993.

internalSignatures.name: Cinema 4D 4.x
internalSignatures.note: Header is 12 bytes: IFF Identifier = “FORM”, Long integer = File size’ Cinema 4d Identifier = “MC4D”
